questions.question: I .................................. the bell six times but no one opened the door.
questions.description: The past tense of ring is rang.

questions.question: Have you .................................. your violin?
questions.description: The past and past participle form of bring is brought.

questions.question: The cat has ................................ all the milk.
questions.description: We need a past participle form after has, have and had. The past participle of drink is drunk.

questions.question: Have you ...................................... your duty?
questions.description: The past participle of do is done.

questions.question: They ..................................... a deep well in the yard.
questions.description: The past and past participle of dig is dug.

questions.question: You needn't have .................................... that much money on that coat.
questions.description: The past participle of spend is spent.

questions.question: The soldiers ..................................... that they would never surrender.
questions.description: Swore is the past participle of swear.

questions.question: I got ...................................... in the traffic jam for two hours.
questions.description: Stuck is the past participle of stick.

questions.question: He ......................................... fifty miles.
questions.description: Strode is the past tense of stride.

questions.question: He .................................... unconsciousness on the pavement.
questions.description: Lay is the past tense of lie.
